text:
No.  
Date:  

**51.** the people, a people  
the people 指人，a people 指民族。The Chinese is a people-loving people.  

**52.** it, one  
It 同一事物，one 同义不同：I lost my pen. I have to buy a new one.  

**53.** that, this  
that 指作上文所提到的，this 导引下文所要说的。  
I was in. That's why ...  

**54.** none, nothing, no one  
none 强调没有，nothing, no one 强调有，nothing 指物，no one 指人。  
—How many ... / How much ...? — None.  

**55.** anyone, any one  
anyone 指人，不能指 of; any one 指人，物均可，可指 of, any one of you.  

**56.** who, what  
who 指姓名或关系，what 指职业或地位。  
What is your dad? He is a teacher.  

**57.** what, which  
what 的选择基础是互限制的，which 在一定范围内进行选择。  
Which do you prefer, bananas or apples?  

**58.** other, another  
other 后接名词复数，another 后接名词单数。other students, other student.  

**59.** not a little, not a bit  
not a little 非常，not a bit 一点也不。  
I'm not a bit tired. 我一点儿也不累。  

**60.** how, much, a lot of  
many 和可数名词连用，much 和不可数名词连用，a lot of 可数。  
但不同于否定句：I haven't many books.  

20
